{
  "ReqType": "SaveAgentDetails",
  "ReqObject": {
    "customerParentId": -1,
    "customerStatusId": 1,
    "customerTypeId": 1,
    "customerIdz": "AGT-001",
    "customerName": "John Doe Agency",
    "customerOpeningBalance": 5000.00,
    "customerNotes": "Premium agent",
    "customerEmails": "john@agency.com",
    "customerPhoneNumber": "+1234567890",
    "customerMobileNumber": "+1234567891",
    "customerFaxNumber": "+1234567892",
    "customerAddressLine1": "123 Main Street",
    "customerAddressLine2": "Suite 100",
    "customerCity": "New York",
    "customerState": "NY",
    "customerZIP": "10001",
    "customerCountry": "USA",
    "createdBy": 1,
    "modifiedBy": 1
  }
}
